definition: scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack

sentences.english: Individual investors, on the other hand, are not so surprised at Hou's hasty retreat.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，散戶們對侯寧的急流勇退並不感覺奇怪。

sentences.english: Now, many retail investors (which account for 60 percent of the market) have bailed; the rest are chewing their fingernails.
sentences.chinese: 如今，很多散戶脫離股海，剩下的則在咬指甲。

sentences.english: The odd dealer's sharp - edged batch work submittal can be solved by a introduction of resources reservation.
sentences.chinese: 引入資源預留的思想來解決散戶的突發批量作業提交。

sentences.english: What individual investors access to the so-called insider information?
sentences.chinese: 散戶憑什麼獲得所謂的內幕信息？

sentences.english: Now, most auction-rate securities held by retail investors will be repurchased.
sentences.chinese: 大部分由散戶投資者持有的此類證券將會被回購。

sentences.english: The odd dealer's sharp-edged batch work submittal can be solved by a introduction of resources reservation.
sentences.chinese: 引入資源預留的思想來解決散戶的突發批量作業提交。

sentences.english: Retail is not our Sedan Chair of it?
sentences.chinese: 我們這些散戶不就是擡轎的嗎？

sentences.english: Characteristics Of Singapores Government Portals And Its Enlightenment;
sentences.chinese: 散戶投資者現可通過銀行櫃檯購買新加坡政府債券。
